instruction: Create an internal company announcement based on the following details.
input: Topic: Company-sponsored charity run. Target: all_users. Tone: Fun & Encouraging.
output:
{"command": "create_announcement", "display_info": {"title": "Lace-Up for a Good Cause!", "message": "An announcement for a charity run has been created."}, "metadata": {"target_roles": ["all_users"]}, "generated_text": "On your marks, get set, GO! üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

We're participating in the City Charity Run 5K this year, and we want YOU on our team! The company will cover the registration fee for all employees.

**Event Date:** August 16th, 2025

Whether you run, jog, or walk, it's all for a great cause. Sign up in the #social channel by July 25th.

Let's show our community spirit!"}

instruction: Buat pengumuman internal perusahaan berdasarkan detail berikut.
input: Topik: Penggalangan dana untuk korban bencana alam. Target: semua pengguna. Nada: Empati & Mengajak.
output:
{"command": "create_announcement", "display_info": {"title": "Mari Bantu Saudara Kita yang Terdampak Bencana", "message": "Pengumuman penggalangan dana telah dibuat."}, "metadata": {"target_roles": ["all_users"]}, "generated_text": "Mari Ulurkan Tangan Membantu,

Seperti yang kita ketahui, bencana banjir telah melanda beberapa daerah di negara kita. Banyak saudara kita yang kehilangan tempat tinggal dan membutuhkan bantuan.

Kami membuka program penggalangan dana secara internal. Perusahaan akan melipatgandakan (match) setiap donasi yang terkumpul dari karyawan.

Anda dapat berdonasi melalui link yang dibagikan oleh HR. Sekecil apa pun bantuan Anda, akan sangat berarti."}

instruction: Create an internal company announcement based on the following details.
input: Topic: Call for speakers for internal tech talk series. Target: Engineering role. Tone: Collaborative & Encouraging.
output:
{"command": "create_announcement", "display_info": {"title": "Share Your Knowledge: Be a Tech Talk Speaker!", "message": "A call for speakers announcement has been created."}, "metadata": {"target_roles": ["Engineering"]}, "generated_text": "Hey Engineering Team!

Our internal tech talk series is back, and we're looking for speakers from our own amazing team! Have you been working on an interesting project, a new technology, or a cool side-project?

This is a great opportunity to share your expertise and help us all learn and grow. Sign up to speak using this form [link].

Let's learn from each other!"}

instruction: Buat pengumuman internal perusahaan berdasarkan detail berikut.
input: Topik: Perubahan proses rekrutmen, sekarang menggunakan platform Greenhouse. Target: HR dan Leadership. Nada: Informatif & Professional.
output:
{"command": "create_announcement", "display_info": {"title": "Transisi ke Platform Rekrutmen Greenhouse", "message": "Pengumuman perubahan proses rekrutmen telah dibuat."}, "metadata": {"target_roles": ["HR", "Leadership"]}, "generated_text": "Pembaruan Proses Rekrutmen

Kepada Tim HR dan Pimpinan,

Sebagai bagian dari upaya efisiensi, mulai 1 July 2025, seluruh proses rekrutmen dan tracking kandidat akan dialihkan ke platform **Greenhouse**.

Sesi pelatihan wajib untuk semua hiring manager dan tim HR akan dijadwalkan minggu depan. Akses ke platform llama akan dinonaktifkan pada akhir bulan July.

Ini adalah langkah penting untuk menyederhanakan proses hiring kita."}

instruction: Buat pengumuman internal perusahaan berdasarkan detail berikut.
input: Topik: System telepon kantor akan mengalami downtime singkat untuk upgrade. Target: Tim Sales, Customer_Support, HR. Nada: Informatif & Teknis.
output:
{"command": "create_announcement", "display_info": {"title": "Pemberitahuan: Upgrade System Telepon", "message": "Pengumuman upgrade system telepon telah dibuat."}, "metadata": {"target_roles": ["Sales", "Customer_Support", "HR"]}, "generated_text": "PEMBERITAHUAN TEKNIS

Harap diperhatikan bahwa system telepon (VoIP) akan mengalami downtime singkat untuk proses upgrade perangkat lunak.

**Jadwal:** Rabu, 18 June 2025, pukul 22:00 - 22:30 WIB.

Selama period ini, panggilan masuk dan keluar tidak akan berfungsi. Layanan akan kembali normal setelahnya. Terima kasih atas pengertiannya."}

instruction: Buat pengumuman internal perusahaan berdasarkan detail berikut.
input: Topik: Pengenalan system Single Sign-On (SSO) baru. Target: semua pengguna. Nada: Informatif & Teknis.
output:
{"command": "create_announcement", "display_info": {"title": "Peningkatan Keamanan: Implementasi SSO", "message": "Pengumuman implementasi SSO telah dibuat."}, "metadata": {"target_roles": ["all_users"]}, "generated_text": "Peningkatan System

Untuk meningkatkan keamanan dan kemudahan akses, kami akan mengimplementasikan system Single Sign-On (SSO) menggunakan Okta mulai **Senin, 21 July 2025**.

Ini berarti Anda hanya perlu satu set kredensial untuk mengakses semua aplikasi internal (Gmail, Slack, Jira, dll.). Panduan aktivasi akan dikirimkan ke email Anda pada hari Jumat sebelumnya.

Tim IT Support akan siaga untuk membantu proses transisi."}

instruction: Buat pengumuman internal perusahaan berdasarkan detail berikut.

instruction: Create an internal company announcement based on the following details.
input: Topic: Fire drill procedure practice. Target: all users in the 'HQ-Building' server/location. Tone: Serious & Informative.
output:
{"command": "create_announcement", "display_info": {"title": "NOTICE: Fire Drill Practice Scheduled", "message": "An announcement for a fire drill has been created."}, "metadata": {"target_roles": ["HQ_employees"]}, "generated_text": "SAFETY NOTICE

This is to inform all personnel in the HQ building that we will be conducting a full fire drill this week to ensure our emergency procedures are effective.

**Date:** Wednesday, June 25th, 2025
**Time:** Approximately 10:30 AM

When the alarm sounds, please evacuate the building calmly using the nearest emergency exit and assemble at the designated meeting point. This is not a test. Participation is mandatory."}

instruction: Create an internal company announcement based on the following details.
input: Topic: The Q3 OKR planning cycle is starting. All team leads must submit their draft OKRs. Target: Leadership and all roles with 'Lead' in their title. Tone: Action-oriented & Formal.
output:

The planning cycle for our Q3 2025 Objectives and Key Results (OKRs) has officially begun.

All team leads are required to submit their draft OKRs in our HR platform by **Friday, June 27th, 2025**. These drafts will be reviewed in a series of alignment meetings next week.

Let's work together to set ambitious and impactful goals for the upcoming quarter."}

instruction: Create an internal company announcement based on the following details.
input: Topic: A reminder that all employees get a free subscription to a mindfulness app. Target: all_users. Tone: Supportive & Wellness-focused.
output:
{"command": "create_announcement", "display_info": {"title": "Friendly Reminder: Your Free Mindfulness App", "message": "An announcement about a wellness benefit has been created."}, "metadata": {"target_roles": ["all_users"]}, "generated_text": "Hi Team,

Just a quick and friendly reminder that as part of our wellness benefits, all employees have free access to a premium subscription of the Calm app.

Take a few minutes for a guided meditation, listen to some focus music, or unwind with a sleep story. Your mental well-being matters!

Instructions to activate your free account are on the HR portal. #Wellness #Mindfulness"}

instruction: Create an internal company announcement based on the following details.
input: Topic: It's 'spirit week' next week, with different dress-up themes each day. Target: all_users. Tone: Fun & Enthusiastic.

* **Monday:** Pajama Day
* **Tuesday:** Tropical Tuesday

* **Thursday:** Throwback Thursday (80s/90s)
* **Friday:** Company Colors Day

Let's see your creativity!"}

instruction: Buat pengumuman internal perusahaan berdasarkan detail berikut.

instruction: Create an internal company announcement based on the following details.
input: Topic: The new automated CI/CD pipeline is now active for all new projects. Target: Engineering. Tone: Technical & Informative.
output:
{"command": "create_announcement", "display_info": {"title": "New CI/CD Pipeline is Now Active", "message": "A technical update for Engineering has been created."}, "metadata": {"target_roles": ["Engineering"]}, "generated_text": "ENGINEERING UPDATE

The new standardized CI/CD pipeline, built on GitLab CI, is now active and mandatory for all new projects initiated from this day forward.

The pipeline includes automated linting, security scanning, and deployment to staging. Documentation and templates can be found in the 'DevOps' Confluence space.

This will significantly improve our deployment speed and reliability."}

instruction: Create an internal company announcement based on the following details.
input: Topic: There's an office 'potluck' lunch next Friday. Target: all_users in the 'HQ-Office'. Tone: Casual & Social.
output:
{"command": "create_announcement", "display_info": {"title": "Get Your Cookbooks Ready: It's Potluck Time!", "message": "An announcement for a potluck lunch has been created."}, "metadata": {"target_roles": ["HQ_employees"]}, "generated_text": "Hey Foodies!

Let's share our favorite dishes! We're hosting a potluck lunch in the office next Friday.

**When:** Friday, June 27th, 2025, at 12:30 PM
**Where:** Main Kitchen Area

There's a sign-up sheet on the fridge so we don't end up with 20 plates of the same thing. Bring your best dish to share! Can't wait to taste everyone's cooking!"}

instruction: Create an internal company announcement based on the following details.
input: Topic: New version of the design system (v3.0) is released. Target: Design and Engineering roles. Tone: Informative & Technical.
output:
{"command": "create_announcement", "display_info": {"title": "üöÄ Design System v3.0 is Live!", "message": "An announcement about the new design system has been created."}, "metadata": {"target_roles": ["Design", "Engineering"]}, "generated_text": "To all Designers and Engineers,

We are excited to announce the official release of our **Design System v3.0 (Codename: 'Cobalt')**.

This version includes updated color palettes, new responsive grid components, and improved accessibility features. The full documentation and Storybook can be found on our design portal.

Please begin migrating your projects to v3.0. Deprecation of v2.0 will be announced soon.

#DesignSystem #Frontend"}

instruction: Create an internal company announcement based on the following details.

{"command": "create_announcement", "display_info": {"title": "Important Notice Regarding Parking Spot Reassignment", "message": "An announcement about parking has been created."}, "metadata": {"target_roles": ["parking_spot_holders"]}, "generated_text": "To All Employees with Assigned Parking,

Due to the upcoming construction of our new building wing, all parking spots in the main lot will be reassigned, effective July 1st, 2025.

You will receive an email from Facilities by the end of this week with your new parking spot number and a map of the revised layout.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your cooperation during this period of expansion."}

instruction: Buat pengumuman internal perusahaan berdasarkan detail berikut.
input: Topik: Ada phishing email yang beredar mengatasnamakan CEO. Peringatkan semua orang untuk tidak mengklik. Target: semua pengguna. Nada: SANGAT MENDESAK.
output:
{"command": "create_announcement", "display_info": {"title": "PERINGATAN KEAMANAN KRITIS: JANGAN KLIK!", "message": "Peringatan keamanan kritis mengenai phishing telah dibuat."}, "metadata": {"target_roles": ["all_users"]}, "generated_text": "**PERINGATAN KEAMANAN - SEGERA BACA**

Saat ini sedang beredar email phishing yang mengatasnamakan CEO kita dan meminta transfer dana atau data sensitif.

**JANGAN MEMBUKA, MENGKLIK LINK, ATAU MEMBALAS EMAIL TERSEBUT.**

Tim IT sedang menangani ini. Jika Anda menerima email mencurigakan, segera laporkan menggunakan tombol 'Report Phishing' di Outlook. Sebarkan informasi ini ke tim Anda."}

instruction: Buat pengumuman internal perusahaan berdasarkan detail berikut.
input: Topik: Semua karyawan wajib memperbarui password akun mereka sebelum akhir bulan. Target: semua pengguna. Nada: Mendesak & Formal.
output:

Anda dapat memperbarui password melalui portal my-account. Harap pastikan password baru Anda memenuhi standard keamanan yang telah ditetapkan. Akun yang belum diperbarui akan dikunci sementara pada 1 July 2025.

Terima kasih atas kerja sama Anda."}

instruction: Create an internal company announcement based on the following details.
input: Topic: The results of the Employee Satisfaction Survey. Target: all_users. Tone: Transparent & Action-oriented.
output:
{"command": "create_announcement", "display_info": {"title": "Employee Satisfaction Survey Results & Next Steps", "message": "An announcement sharing survey results has been created."}, "metadata": {"target_roles": ["all_users"]}, "generated_text": "Hi Team,

Thank you to everyone who participated in our recent Employee Satisfaction Survey. We're pleased to share that our overall satisfaction score is 8.2/10!

We've analyzed all your feedback and identified key areas for improvement, including 'Career Growth Opportunities' and 'Cross-Departmental Communication'.

The leadership team is committed to addressing these points, and we will share a detailed action plan during the next Town Hall. The full (anonymized) report is available on the HR portal.

Thanks for your valuable input!"}

instruction: Create an internal company announcement based on the following details.

output:
{"command": "create_announcement", "display_info": {"title": "We Did It! Record-Breaking Launch!", "message": "An announcement celebrating a successful launch has been created."}, "metadata": {"target_roles": ["all_users"]}, "generated_text": "Amazing news, everyone!

The launch of our 'Insights' feature last week was a massive success, breaking our record for first-week user adoption by **200%**!

This incredible achievement was only possible because of the hard work and collaboration of EVERY department, from Engineering and Product to Marketing and Support. Thank you for your dedication.

Let's enjoy this win!"}
